snippet: A lawsuit claims that an expanded national security screening targeting Muslims uses overly broad criteria and has tied up naturalization and green card applications filed by Palestinian, Iranian and Somali applicants.
abstract: Five people file lawsuit against federal government, claiming that expanded national security screening targeting Muslims has led to lengthy delays and denials in their citizenship and green card applications.
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit claims that an expanded national security screening targeting Muslims uses overly broad criteria and has tied up naturalization and green card applications filed by Palestinian, Iranian and Somali applicants.

headline.main: Suit Claims Security Screening Delays Immigration Applications for Muslims
headline.print_headline: Suit Claims Security Screening Delays Immigration Applications for Muslims
